definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Ark Angel now entering Earth orbit.
sentences.chinese: “方舟天使”號現在進入地球軌道。

sentences.english: They came up with several designs for giant arks of sanity.
sentences.chinese: 他們理智地想出幾個特大方舟的設計。

sentences.english: The ark itself contained the tablets of the covenant.
sentences.chinese: 方舟本身包含着寫有契約的便箋。

sentences.english: It awaits this long destined awakening, from within the sacred Ark.
sentences.chinese: 它期待着這長久以來的覺醒，神聖的方舟就在它裏面。
諾亞方舟遺蹟被發現了？
與“方舟天使”號停靠在一起。

sentences.english: Noah then removed the covering from the ark and saw that the surface of the ground was dry.
sentences.chinese: 挪亞撤去方舟的蓋觀看，便見地面上乾了。

sentences.english: Tang has since said he will sue Fang for libel – and it’s not the first time he has faced such a threat.
sentences.chinese: 唐駿曾一度表示他將以誹謗罪起訴方舟子。

sentences.english: The Ark Angel's reflex furnace is offline.
Well, all I can find is the Ark Angel.
sentences.chinese: 好的，我所能找到只有“方舟天使”號。

sentences.english: It was to be pitched inside and out with tar, which would make the ark waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 要在方舟的裏外抹上松香，這樣方舟就能防水。

sentences.english: It was to be pitched inside and out with tar, which would make the ark waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 要在方舟的裏外抹上松香，這樣方舟就能防水。

sentences.english: "Ark Royal" was once led invasion of Iraq to participate in the British navy.
sentences.chinese: “皇家方舟”號曾經領導英國海軍參加攻打伊拉克。

sentences.english: I was once Dr. Fang's ally and supporter because I had been naive enough to just simply take his words.
sentences.chinese: 我曾是方舟子的支持者與同伴，因爲幼稚到輕信人言。

sentences.english: Attacked fraud busters awarded only 2600 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 打假鬥士方舟子被襲只獲2600元賠償。
